******************************************************************************/const FileSaverType={JSON:"application/json"};class FileSaverService{save(type){let charset=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:"utf-8";let data=arguments.length>2?arguments[2]:undefined;let fileName=arguments.length>3?arguments[3]:undefined;const a=document.createElement('a');a.href="data:".concat(type,";charset=").concat(charset,",").concat(data);a.download=fileName;a.click();return a;}}export default FileSaverService;export{FileSaverType};
